data.message: Eminem please go back to rapping how u used to rap, where it sounded like u had a peg on ur nose. The way u sound now is different and it sux... Why change something that made millions of people like u?! Go back...lol.

replies.message:
I'm a DETROIT rapper.. I did a song on current events from my perspective. It's is paying homage to the Eminem DETROIT D12 Sound 🔊. What do you think 💭⁉️ Did I do this any justice⁉️ Listen 👂🏾 👉🏽 http://bit.ly/TomiYouTube 👈🏽 Remember I Am A Black Rapper. Listen and you will Understand Y. Please leave a comment, if you like it Share it. 

P.s the song is Titled TOMI LAHREN
